comment: you are amazing sir! thanks for sharing
There is a little typo in the 2nd order integrated rate law : it's +k•t and not -

I'm getting a Master's Degree in Industrial Chemistry in few days, just stumbled upon this video. His teaching manner is really efficient, I've never seen such an interesting lesson about chemical kinetics. Greetings from Bologna! And thanks you for uploading.

i hope this prof would do all chemistry courses in videos , he got real talent delivering education , other chemistry teachers makes chemistry so difficult , while he makes it easy to understand , this is the talent...
